programme.desc: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder; Fin must contend with a suspects aggrieved son; Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: Having taken on new identities provided by Root, the team members try to adapt to their new lives; when some find it difficult to ignore the machines numbers, they put everyone at risk of being found by Samaritan.

programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge

programme.sub-title: Parkinson Takes a Christmas Look at Morecambe and Wise 1974
programme.desc: Chat show compilation of previous Morecambe and Wise shows introduced by Michael Parkinson. Those taking part include Eric Morecambe, Ernie Wise, Tom Jones, Andre Previn, Shirley Bassey, Peter Cushing and Glenda Jackson.

programme.title: Victoria Wood With All the Trimmings
programme.desc: Victoria Wood serves up a large helping of Christmas comedy. Featuring a 1950s big band show, a Dickensian saga and a documentary set aboard a cruise liner.

programme.title: William Nicholson Remembers... Shadowlands
programme.desc: Screenwriter William Nicholson recalls the making of the 1985 BBC drama Shadowlands, an exploration of faith, love and loss that saw Joss Ackland playing Narnia writer CS Lewis and Claire Bloom in the role of the poet Joy Gresham. William shares a tale as compelling as that of the drama itself, telling how Shadowlands success transformed his life completely, taking him to Hollywood and making him one of the UKs most accomplished film and television writers.

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: British writer/professor C.S. Lewis falls in love with dying American poet Joy Gresham.

programme.title: Tales of Winter: The Art of Snow and Ice
programme.desc: Winter was not always beautiful. Until Pieter Bruegel painted Hunters in the Snow, the long bitter months had never been transformed into a thing of beauty.

programme.desc: Deck the halls with sloths and wallabies because Ben Fogle and Kate Humble are racing back to Longleat Safari Park for a magical series of Animal Park at Christmas.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A purpose-built flat in Brentwood, Essex, a smart one-bedroom flat in Glasgow and a three-bedroom house with lovely countryside views in Bodiam, East Sussex, are all sold under the hammer. Martel, Jacqui and Tommy follow the developers progress.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles is joined by none other than Father Christmas to present a fabulously festive Bargain Hunt. Hopefully unwrapping lots of profits are two teams of Christmas shoppers, and gifting their knowledge are experts Raj Bisram and Izzie Balmer.

programme.title: Father Brown

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A first-time buyer has decided to leave the home she grew up in on the outskirts of Birmingham for a new one in the nearby Shropshire countryside. Nicki Chapman shows her what this stunning county has to offer, and helps out by pulling pints for the locals at a community-owned pub.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Pugin Tiles, Medicine Ball, Duke of York Stone
programme.desc: A collection of encaustic tiles leaves Jo and JB speechless, Glen hopes to find a fortune with his metal detector, and swimming teacher Lynne treats the dealers to a workout.

programme.title: Pointless Celebrities
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and co-host Richard Osman present a special celebrity edition of the general knowledge quiz in which four teams try to come up with the answers that no-one else could think of. The celebrities competing for the Pointless trophy are Kate Holderness, Adele Roberts, Dave Gorman, Jarred Christmas, Cat Sandion, Martin Dougan, Matt Dawson and Martin Bayfield.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Tim Vine, Cheryl Baker, Kelle Bryan, Will Best and Tia Kofi race in moving podiums in a festive episode of the quiz to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Walford reacts to the aftermath of a fire, Kat attempts to make the best of Christmas by putting plans in place, and Anthony raises concerns.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Its festive season at The Repair Shop, and this year the team of experts are back spreading joy and creating more Christmas magic with their festive fixes. First through the barn doors are two giant fibre-glass puffins that were gifted to a very special childrens bookshop. The puffins have welcomed generations of children and been at the centre of the bookshops Christmas celebrations for over 50 years.

programme.title: A Mary Berry Christmas
programme.desc: Dame Mary Berry celebrates the magic of the seasons traditions. Along with her special guests - legendary actor Alison Steadman, Commonwealth sprinter and star of Gladiators Harry Aikines-Aryeetey and much-loved broadcaster and presenter Zoe Ball. And central to it all are Marys exceptional recipes, including pigs in blankets cassoulet, roast king mushrooms with chestnut stuffing, a magnificent cherry and lemon mille-feuille and a show-stopping grand finale of pear and ginger steamed pudding.

programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. programme.title: Click and Collect
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and Andrew has failed to buy his daughters main present: the elusive Sparklehoof the Unicorn Princess. His over-friendly neighbour Dev manages to nab perhaps the last one in the UK online, but its 270 miles away.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy, Richard and James face their greatest challenge to date as all three are sent to Africa and each told to buy a second-hand car costing no more than £1,500. It must not be a 4x4 and must not be designed in any way to go off-road. Which could be a problem, since their task is then to drive across the wilds of Botswana, negotiating massive salt pans, treacherous rivers and animal reserves.

Man Like Mobeen
programme.desc: Mobeen receives a surprise visit from the armed police, who arrest Eight on suspicion of supplying drugs to school children in Small Heath. The real culprit is Shahid, a local dealer who has enlisted the help of his mums cousins cousin.

programme.title: Man Like Mobeen
programme.desc: When Mobeen learns that his little sister Aks has been suspended from school for fighting, he realises he might not be the best role model. His uncles suggest that an arranged marriage might bring a much-needed female perspective into Akss life.

programme.title: Man Like Mobeen

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: James Bond Poster, Tiffany Ink Blotter, Titanic Artefacts
programme.desc: New dealer Rambo gets excited about a Bond poster, a shiny Tiffany ink blotter causes a stir, and some intriguing artefacts tempt the dealers.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp hosts two teams of married couples who are shopping at a bustling antiques fair in Nottinghamshire alongside experts Phil Serrell and Roo Irvine.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Simon Weston and Monty Panesar join Tim Medhurst and Roo Irvine for a jolly jaunt in South West Wales. The car of choice is a 1960 Morris Oxford.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Brainbox Challenge
programme.desc: Clive Anderson hosts a brain training quiz show in which contestants battle to prove themselves in a sequence of brain games which test their memory, language, visual, numerical and spacial skills.

programme.title: Life in the Snow
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan meets the animals who live in natures winter wonderlands. He reveals their survival secrets, from the polar bear mother who gives her cubs the best possible start in life, to the owl that finds food hidden beneath a blanket of snow.

programme.title: Funeral in Berlin
programme.desc: Spy Harry Palmers assignment is to smuggle a Russian agent who is defecting to the West across the Berlin Wall and back to England - in a coffin. However, Harry discovers that the Russian may not be all he appears.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel continues to explore successful food marriages in the kitchen, with the spotlight this time on surf and turf - the classic culinary pairing of fish and meat. From mouth-watering recipes like trout with Parma ham to lamb shanks with anchovy.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The pavilion in the charming seaside town of Exmouth in Devon is full of people waiting for valuations. Paul Martin, falls in love with a Newlyn Copper vase, while expert Will Axon spots a bronze sensor bowl and gold rings. Elsewhere, Christina Trevanion enthuses about a silver frame. Also down in Devon, Paul goes for a journey with a difference - a tram ride alongside the river Axe.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Jim Howick, Matt Morsia, Rebecca Lucy Taylor and Susan Wokoma take on a series of rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quick-fire round, and the scores are tallied across the week.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara is back with all the unmissable news and behind-the-scenes action from Strictly as another of the final couples join her on the sofa. Also, some celebrity friends give their opinion on their loved ones chances this weekend.

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: Inspired by the sparkling Christmas lights in Kansas City USA, Nigella shows us how to have our most relaxed, most spectacular Christmas yet. Shell introduce us to the local, home-spun food that has inspired some of this years favourite festive recipes, adding a British twist back in her kitchen.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: To celebrate another year of fishing, Paul and Bob travel to south west France to fish the River Lot and soak up the local French culture. Will Ted manage to make the journey too?

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Youll Never Ride Alone
programme.desc: An emotional journey through the Hairy Bikers story as Si King celebrates the life of best mate and former TV partner Dave Myers. It follows Si as he leads a motorcycle convoy to Daves hometown of Barrow-in-Furness, while archive material, new interviews and previously unseen footage help celebrate Daves life, charting a journey that took him around the world while cooking up a storm as one of televisions greatest ever double acts.

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: The brilliant Judi Love introduces comedians Dan Tiernan and John Kearns to the stage.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The story of an archer in the army of Richard Coeur de Lion who fights against the Norman invaders and becomes the legendary hero known as Robin Hood.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: Its the series finale, and the teams must race from Medellín, Colombias second-largest city, in an epic push of over 1,000km to the finish line on the Guajira Peninsula, the northernmost region of South America. They can either cut a course inland or follow the tourist trail along the Caribbean coast. After 33 days and nearly 5,900km, which team will triumph and be the first to sign the all-important book and be crowned the winners?

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: Police are alerted to the discovery of human remains near Aviemore. They suspect this might be the last resting place of Rodrigo Falcon, a popular barman who went missing in December 2022. Sergeant Stephen Todd and his team confront a woman who is keeping monkeys and tropical animals in a ruined house in freezing cold Caithness. In Inverness, PC Siobhan Cooper faces rowdy bank holiday crowds.

As the children start their day, they are thinking of new ideas to be super-kind. Jessica and Orla draw lovely pictures for the teachers, which makes Mrs Farrell and Miss Gerrard feel happy. At lunchtime Solomon is finding the lid on his yogurt a bit tricky, so Sam helps him to open it!

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Grace shows off three amazing machines that all go on water. Grace first lifts off the water using a hydrofoil surfboard, then she shows off an amazing yacht transporter and does her best superhero impression on a hydroflier.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say blanket, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different blankets - a blue blanket, a baby blanket, a woolly blanket and a picnic blanket!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Five and friends discover a way to make themselves ten times bigger. Learn how to count, add and think in tens with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: A star leads Alphablock S and her friends on a magical journey through the night sky.

programme.title: Wonderblocks

programme.title: Colourblocks

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a stunt mole. Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: Yukee

programme.title: Something Special

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: When Kwazii discovers a blue whale with an injured tail, the Octonauts attempt to use a giant net and Octofloats to keep it from sinking. Meanwhile, Peso and Tweak collaborate on a special brace for its tail, and Kwazii, Dashi and Shellington try to find it enough food. But when the supporting net breaks, the Octonauts have to launch an emergency free-fall rescue.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: After Old Brown snatches her, Cotton-tail gets stuck up a tree. Its up to Peter, Lily and Benjamin to rescue her before either a passing Mr Tod seizes her or the angry Owl returns.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Its news time at the Clubhouse, and the Squirrels share their exciting news of the week with each other. Happy got a new bath sponge, Norrie is growing a sunflower and Roly, after thinking hard if hes got any news at all, remembers hes getting a new brother or sister. The Squirrels have all sorts of questions to ask.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Sledding, snowball tag... its a snowy day in Sweetwood! Zigzags day is almost ruined when she refuses to wear mittens and gets way too cold. Luckily, Vida knows how to warm her up and Popcorn knows how to make cocoa, so together they save the snow day! And Zigzag learns to love mittens.

programme.title: Supertato

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Its hard enough for Mojo and Bo to help Jackson get all his sheep back in their pen. But its even harder when the hungry sheep start chewing up Prestons flower festival!

programme.title: Bluey

programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Library Book
programme.desc: Ross is elated that the university library contains his doctoral dissertation, but he is shocked to discover that it is located in a remote corner frequently used by students having sex. Elsewhere, the tables are turned on Joey when Erin is the one to just want sex and not a relationship.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Doesnt Like Dogs
programme.desc: Joey may have ruined Rachels chances with Tag when he opens his mouth during Thanksgiving dinner, and Phoebe reveals that she has been secretly keeping a cute dog in her room for a few days while its owner is away.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Candy
programme.desc: Rachel is dating her assistant, Tag, but they must keep it a secret at work because of the companys anti-dating policy. Her friends warn her that the relationship will only cause her trouble, but just for fun, she becomes more brazen about it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Cheesecakes
programme.desc: Chandler and Rachel pig out on a neighbours cheesecake that was mistakenly delivered to Chandler. They feel bad, but not quite guilty enough to refrain from eating a second one that has also been wrongly delivered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Theyre Up All Night
programme.desc: During their fist night together, Rachel and Tag realise they forgot to ship out an important package at the office.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes new job as a telemarketer gets off to a tricky start when the first person she calls, an office worker called Earl, tells her he feels unappreciated and wants to kill himself. Phoebe keeps him on the telephone, trying to persuade him otherwise and finally takes the desperate measure of going to his office to convince him to stay alive.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
programme.desc: Celebrating Rachels 30th birthday inspires the friends to reminisce about their own 30th birthdays. Joey got angry with God for breaking their deal, Ross bought himself a sports car in an attempt to recapture his youth, and Monica got blind drunk and embarrassed herself at her surprise party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Brain
programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member that she will be fired so that his character will get her characters brain, and Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandlers wedding - he wants to play the bagpipes.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Truth About London
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fondly reminisce about London until a startling revelation leaves Chandler floored. Meanwhile, Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes to play on Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Cheap Wedding Dress
programme.desc: Monica regrets telling a fellow bride-to-be about a cheaper bridal shop, and later she has to fight the woman tooth and nail for a unique wedding dress before competing with her to hire Chandlers favourite band for the night. Meanwhile, Joey and Ross discover that theyre dating the same girl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is overjoyed to be nominated for a `Soapie, the third most prestigious award in daytime dramas. Meanwhile, engaged Monica frets when she realises she will never experience the thrill of a new relationship again, Ross spots Chandler sneaking out of a male strip club, and Phoebe meets a cute guy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross and Monicas Cousin
programme.desc: Monica is so perturbed by Chandlers instant attraction to her gorgeous visiting cousin that she persuades Ross to let her stay at his apartment. Despite being her blood relative, Ross cannot restrain himself from attempting to kiss her. She escapes to Phoebes apartment, but her beauty flabbergasts even Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The Walsh boys head to Iceland for an epic Christmas adventure. Barney takes his dad well out of his comfort zone with some extraordinary activities, from a dramatic glacier rescue to the magical mystery of the Yule Lads, and from a dip in the famous geothermal pools to hitting the snowy slopes on snowboards, theyre in for a festive trip theyll never forget.

programme.desc: During their fist night together, Rachel and Tag realise they forgot to ship out an important package at the office.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes new job as a telemarketer gets off to a tricky start when the first person she calls, an office worker called Earl, tells her he feels unappreciated and wants to kill himself. Phoebe keeps him on the telephone, trying to persuade him otherwise and finally takes the desperate measure of going to his office to convince him to stay alive.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
programme.desc: Celebrating Rachels 30th birthday inspires the friends to reminisce about their own 30th birthdays. Joey got angry with God for breaking their deal, Ross bought himself a sports car in an attempt to recapture his youth, and Monica got blind drunk and embarrassed herself at her surprise party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Brain
programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member that she will be fired so that his character will get her characters brain, and Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandlers wedding - he wants to play the bagpipes.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Truth About London
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fondly reminisce about London until a startling revelation leaves Chandler floored. Meanwhile, Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes to play on Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Cheap Wedding Dress
programme.desc: Monica regrets telling a fellow bride-to-be about a cheaper bridal shop, and later she has to fight the woman tooth and nail for a unique wedding dress before competing with her to hire Chandlers favourite band for the night. Meanwhile, Joey and Ross discover that theyre dating the same girl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is overjoyed to be nominated for a `Soapie, the third most prestigious award in daytime dramas. Meanwhile, engaged Monica frets when she realises she will never experience the thrill of a new relationship again, Ross spots Chandler sneaking out of a male strip club, and Phoebe meets a cute guy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross and Monicas Cousin
programme.desc: Monica is so perturbed by Chandlers instant attraction to her gorgeous visiting cousin that she persuades Ross to let her stay at his apartment. Despite being her blood relative, Ross cannot restrain himself from attempting to kiss her. She escapes to Phoebes apartment, but her beauty flabbergasts even Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel runs into an old sorority sister with whom she once shared a passionate encounter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: With only four weeks until their wedding, Monica and Chandler try to write their vows. Chandler enlists the boys help, while Monica does the same with the girls.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica convinces a reluctant Chandler to travel to Las Vegas to invite his estranged cross-dressing father to their wedding. Meanwhile, Rachel is furious that she is the only friend who Monica has not allowed to drive the Porsche that her father gave her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The Walsh boys head to Iceland for an epic Christmas adventure. programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldons flat is burgled. Determined to out-wit any thieves, the gang work on creating a state-of-the-art security system to protect the apartment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon has `theorist block and is finding it difficult to muddle through a formula hes been working on. Taking inspiration from Albert Einstein, he takes a job at the Cheesecake Factory to try to kick start his creativity.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is invited to Switzerland on Valentines Day to see the worlds largest particle accelerator. Sheldon is gutted when Leonard asks Penny to go with him, as a Valentines Day treat, instead of him. Sheldon tries to coerce the couple into letting him take Pennys place, will they relent?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is summoned to court for driving through a red light while taking Penny to hospital in an earlier episode. He misses meeting Stan Lee, creator of `Spiderman, at the comic book store and riles the judge so much that he ends up in prison. Penny feels so guilty that Sheldon has missed out on the opportunity to meet Stan Lee that she finds out his home address and takes Sheldon there.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang squabble over a ring which they believe was used in `The Lord of the Rings. Leonard wants to give it back to its original owner, Koothrappali wants to sell it so that he can buy a jet ski but Sheldon becomes obsessed with the ring and starts to turn into Gollum from The Lord of the Rings. Can the guys reach an agreement and will Sheldon return to normal?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon has been awarded a prestigious prize by the university but is scared of collecting the gong at a ceremony because he knows hell have to give a speech. Penny tries to gee Sheldon up using rousing references to `X-Men and Leonard and Koothrappali offer psychological guidance without much success. On the night, Sheldons nerves get the better of him and he has a drink before going on stage.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tells Penny that he loves her but doesnt get the response he would have liked. Elsewhere, the gang go bowling and get a surprise when Sheldons enemy, `Star Trek actor Wil Wheaton, is playing in the opposing team. Will Sheldon get revenge on Wil?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to hide his friendship with Penny from Leonard but it isnt long before his double life is exposed to Penny and Leonard. Can Penny and Leonard keep their friendships with Sheldon without hurting each other?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon meets a famous physicist online and invites her over to the flat. Once there, she flirts with Leonard and pays a visit to him in his bedroom. Penny finds out and confronts Leonard. Meanwhile, Sheldon is irked that Leonard is showing interest in his friend.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: This episode flashes back to the start of Sheldon and Leonard friendship seven years previously and explains the housemate agreement and how Sheldon saved the lives of his friends.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj and Howard register Sheldon for online dating and find the perfect woman, and Penny seduces Leonard while shes drunk but regrets it the next day. Will Leonard regret their encounter?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Christmas festivities are in full swing in the village, as Warren and Mercedes look forward to the future and Frankie confides in Dodger.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart discovers a hidden talent for jazz drumming, sparking bitter feelings of resentment from Lisa.

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off: Stand Up To Cancer
programme.desc: Ellie Goulding, Mawaan Rizwan, Sophie Morgan and Tracey-Ann Oberman make marble cake, jam roly-poly and biscuit portraits of their celebrity heroes.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Dating Naked UK
programme.desc: Two familiar faces are hell bent on reclaiming their connections. The daters indulge in a reverse strip tease, strengthening some and weakening others.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Jessica, whos 28, is a real-life Bridget Jones who wants the perfect man to bring out her naughty side. Opera singer Clare, whos 21, seeks someone who hits all the right notes.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon tries to be spontaneous, it leads to unexpected friction between Penny, Amy and Bernadette.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: As the gang celebrates Star Wars Day, Sheldon has difficulty dealing with the death of Professor Proton.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Fresh singletons visit the restaurant and favourite First Dates daters return for a special episode celebrating Fred and his teams successes, engagements and the first First Dates baby.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: With Erica at a crossroads about her future, she draws inspiration from Baby Boom and crafts a plan to have it all; Adam remakes the "Uptown Girl" music video, meets Carmens father and learns to be more of a "downtown man."

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A new teacher at school named Mr. Lassen is determined to crush Bart Simpsons spirit.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A mid-life crisis has Homer taking up bass guitar and forming a cover band with other dads, but the bands success is threatened by the breakout potential of one of its members.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil is determined to finally scare Claire on Halloween. Meanwhile, for the first time, Gloria is feeling self-conscious about her age when someone correctly assumes she is Jays wife.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria rents a cabin in the mountains where the family can celebrate a picture-perfect Christmas.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When Claire and Phil go out with a couple they met on vacation, the Dunphys end up having to pay the bill; Haley, Alex and Luke scramble to come through when Mitchell cashes in a birthday coupon they gave him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The third series begins with Sheldon going back to Texas in disgrace when he learns that his friends tampered with his Arctic expedition data because his quest for a breakthrough was becoming unbearable to live with. His friends are forced to follow him. Meanwhile, Leonard is peeved that his attempts to woo Penny are being constantly interrupted but is cheered up when they finally sleep together.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny feel awkward around each other after their romantic liaison. They agree to be friends but both find it hard to fight their attraction to each other. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Howard make a bet to determine a species of cricket.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tries to mould Penny into his dream woman and rewards her with chocolate when she does things he approves of in the hope that she will keep doing them. Howard and Raj go to a goth nightclub. They meet two women and things are going well until the ladies take the friends to a tattoo shop.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.sub-title: Did the Chicken Cross the Road?
programme.desc: Cam forgets the words to his favourite country song and decides to reconnect with his roots by getting a chicken. When Alex is up for a prestigious government job that requires a family interview, everyone overcompensates and jeopardises her chances.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When Dedes husband, Jerry, comes to town to bequeath her possessions to the family, Jay and Gloria invite him to stay with them while he is in town.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tubes naughty little sister, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorcycle and bicycle variety.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny tags along to Sheldons first ever date with a woman hes been texting for months. Meanwhile, Wolowitz finds a new use for a robotic arm.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon realises he wont live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, so he attempts to extend his lifespan. Meanwhile, the gang bump into Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak at The Cheesecake Factory.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys are concerned when Sheldon searches for an alternative to human companionship after he and Amy break up. Can they help restore his faith in people? Meanwhile, when things take a turn for the worse and Sheldon starts bulk buying pet cats, Leonard gets Sheldons mum to pay him a visit.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitzs comes to light as he tries to win back his ex-girlfriend, Bernadette. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard realises that hes the only one of the gang without a girlfriend, while Sheldon wants to get rid of his when she hatches a plan for him to meet her mother.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitzs comes to light as he tries to win back his ex-girlfriend, Bernadette. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard believes his problem with women stems from a lack of confidence and vows to be more self-assured around attractive women. Meanwhile, Wolowitz has a call from the FBI.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang are excited about a new screening of `Indiana Jones and Raiders of the Lost Ark because there are 21 seconds of additional footage being seen for the first time and camp out to get tickets for the film. However, their plans are scuppered by Sheldons greatest nemesis, Wil Wheaton. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to her first slumber party.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Pennys dad comes to visit, Leonard discovers that she told her parents they were back together because they always had a soft spot for him. Leonard takes full advantage and plays his boyfriend role to the hilt much to Pennys dismay. Elsewhere, Raj is disappointed when Bernadette shows up during his and Howards quality time.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy finds she has sexual feelings for Pennys ex-boyfriend Zack while Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be the better superhero.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys warm to Pennys new boyfriend Zack and find a way to bond with him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonards idea for a smartphone application derails his friendship with Sheldon as they fight for control of the project.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Tensions run high when Bernadette runs into her hulk of an ex-boyfriend at a science conference. Threatened by Bernadettes ex-boyfriend, Wolowitz has an argument with Bernadette and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon agrees to take part in a short lecture series at the university but is unnerved by the students apparent dislike of him. On Amys advice, he asks Penny to give him acting lessons so he can learn to engage his audience better. Koothrappali, meanwhile, fantasises about his best friends girlfriend.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A wealthy benefactor at the university makes Leonard consider how far hes willing to go in the name of science.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Wolowitz is torn between taking things to the next level with Bernadette and pleasing his mother. Meanwhile, Leonard rekindles his relationship with Rajs sister, Priya.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon gets a new group of friends when the gang start hanging out at Rajs more often and he realises that its actually Leonard who is the centre of their social group and not him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard must choose between new girlfriend Priya and his friendship with Penny, and Howard drives Sheldon crazy with a magic trick.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldos totally distraught - even to the point of calling in the police and trying to call in the FBI - after someone has hacked into his `World of Warcraft account and stolen all his information and his virtual possessions. With Howard, Leonard and Raj on the case with Sheldon trolling though the game with made up new characters, Howard is able to determine that the thief is someone by the name of Todd Zarnecki.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy experiment on their friends by spreading gossip, while Howard takes a big step in his relationship with Bernadette.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Priya uses her legal nous to dissect the roommate agreement and put Sheldon in his place. Meanwhile, the girls take Sheldon dancing.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj attempts to cure his anxiety about talking to women, while Penny uses Bernadette to spy on Leonard and his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard finally tells him mum that hes engaged to Bernadette. Unfortunately, the news lands his mum in hospital.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette receives her PhD and the gang begin to tease Wolowitz for being the only one among them who isnt a doctor. Meanwhile, Koothrappali becomes Sheldons new flatmate after hearing Leonard and Priya engaging in a `Star Trek bedroom fantasy.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Homer forms a motorcycle gang with his friends, Marge is kidnapped by a rival gang.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa needs the help of pop star Lady Gaga when her popularity plummets.

programme.desc: A bad day compels Penny to re-evaluate her choices -- including Leonard. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Howard must care for Mrs. Wolowitz and Sheldon gives Raj advice on relationships.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Odessa File
programme.desc: Following the suicide of an elderly Jewish man, investigative journalist Peter Miller sets out to hunt down an SS Captain and former concentration camp commander. programme.title: Star Trek

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: First to host in Lichfield, Staffs is business consultant James Herbert, who has high hopes for his complex Italian menu. He also has some fun photo frolics planned. His guests are 22-year-old football coach Tim Travers, 30-year-old sales assistant and all-round party boy JP Goodyear-Martinez, 38-year-old businesswoman Amanda Smith, and straight-talking retired mental health nurse Ronnie Imlah.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Ronnie Imlah hosts in Lichfield, with a menu inspired by dishes eaten at friends parties. With a revelation about Ronnies past leaving guests in shock, JP Goodyear-Martinez and Amanda Smith argue over plastic surgery.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: JP Goodyear-Martinez hosts in Lichfield, treating his guests to a mix of Jamaican food, tight lycra outfits and a drag queen. James Herberts rendition of `Bohemian Rhapsody doesnt go down too well with Ronnie.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Football coach Tim Travers is determined to prove his kitchen skills despite never having cooked before. Luckily, his mum is on the other end of the phone to help out every step of the way with his American-themed menu.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final night in Lichfield and there are high hopes for recruitment consultant Amanda Smiths evening, with her guests expecting a well-executed and sophisticated menu. programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Margaret Dugdall runs Castle Lodge Hotel in Felixstowe to exacting standards, but when her daughter Ruth leaves clues in the bedrooms, not all the guests are pleased.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Gordon and Sandra McCallum run Bryn Woodlands House in Colwyn Bay and take their guests harness racing. But how will one guest react to finding a snake in his bed?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final BandB of the week is the Tollemache Arms in Cheshire, where 24-year-old all-round performer Edward Prophet and his fiancee Rachel Pickup like to add some showbiz razzmatazz.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its judgement day for the BandB owners as they discover who wins as the weeks best-value establishment. As tensions run high, it falls to final hosts Ed and Rachel to reveal the winner.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: After recovering from leukaemia, Toby is driven to build a complex home around an old oak tree in Suffolk. But can he balance high architecture and health with a comfy family place?

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kathryn, who has lived on the same street in north London for 60 years, is building a mirror image of her current Edwardian house, right next door, but with a 21st century twist.

programme.title: Britains Most Expensive Houses
programme.desc: Constance is on a mission to get the listing for celebrity singer Laura Comforts £12.5m home. Guy values a quaint Tudor cottage in Henley-on-Thames. And Diana takes on a high-end London rental.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Martin, whos 77, is rushed to St Georges after collapsing at home. Its not the first time that Martin has blacked out, and he has two further seizures in AandE. While doctors carry out urgent tests, his wife Margaret talks about their life together.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: IT project manager Robert, whos 37, was travelling to work on his motorbike when he collided with a car. Robert is confused and has injuries to his face and head, so hes taken straight for a CT scan to assess their severity.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. programme.desc: Mikaela and Sam once again join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robot The Fallen.

programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: When dictator Joseph Stalin dies, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. As they bumble, brawl and back-stab their way to the top, the question remains -- just who is running the government?

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: When dictator Joseph Stalin dies, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. As they bumble, brawl and back-stab their way to the top, the question remains -- just who is running the government?

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Gunslinger Cole Thornton rides into a small town to work for a cattle baron, but quits after learning that his would-be employer wants to drive a family off their land and obtain their water supply. Thornton leaves the situation unresolved, but a chance encounter takes him back to El Dorado, where he joins the sheriff in a range war.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Thriller about a photojournalist on board a destroyer, the Bedford, commanded by Captain Finlander. When the ship discovers a Soviet sub in Greenlands territorial waters, the Captain begins a relentless pursuit that pushes his crew to breaking point.

programme.title: The Damned United
programme.desc: The story of Brian Cloughs 44 day stint as manager of Leeds United Football Club. England, in 1974. When Don Revie quits Leeds to become the England boss, the outspoken Brian Clough takes charge. Determined to impose his own style upon Revies tough tackling team, Clough soon alienates his players and the board. Based on the book by David Pearce.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: During the Yom Kippur War in 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir must navigate overwhelming odds, a sceptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger as millions of lives hang in the balance.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A reluctant bare-knuckle boxer and his manager brother must travel across the country for one last fight, but an unexpected travel companion exposes the cracks in their bond along the way.

programme.title: mother!
programme.desc: A young womans tranquil life with her poet husband is suddenly disrupted by mysterious guests, and her confusion turns to horror as her husband seems to encourage their imposition into their lives.

programme.title: mother!
programme.desc: A young womans tranquil life with her poet husband is suddenly disrupted by mysterious guests, and her confusion turns to horror as her husband seems to encourage their imposition into their lives.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Paul Blart desperately wants to become a cop, but he is too fat to pass the physical exam. He instead works as a security guard in a shopping mall. One day criminals put the mall under siege, and Blart takes it upon himself to save the day.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The Spy Kids set off on their third adventure. Secret Agent Carmen finds herself trapped in a 3-D virtual reality video game designed by their new arch nemesis, the Toymaker. Juni must save his sister, as they battle it out against lifelike 3-D monsters, completing each progressively harder level and ultimately trying to save the youth of the world.

Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Geeky highschooler Sam Witwicky buys his first-ever car, hoping it will improve his chances with Mikaela. Imagine his surprise when his beat-down Camaro transforms into an alien robot called `Bumblebee and asks for his assistance in a deadly war.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Geeky highschooler Sam Witwicky buys his first-ever car, hoping it will improve his chances with Mikaela. Imagine his surprise when his beat-down Camaro transforms into an alien robot called `Bumblebee and asks for his assistance in a deadly war.

programme.desc: Geeky highschooler Sam Witwicky buys his first-ever car, hoping it will improve his chances with Mikaela. Imagine his surprise when his beat-down Camaro transforms into an alien robot called `Bumblebee and asks for his assistance in a deadly war.

programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A mans quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbours discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.desc: Santa Clauss wish comes true when he accidentally bumps his head and starts believing hes SuperKlaus. With the help of Billie and Leo his elf-xecutive assistant, SuperKlaus will take on a toy-obsessed businessman to save Christmas.

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: An immature party girl moves in with her brothers family to get over a breakup and throws their lives out of whack.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.
