Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.desc: Santa Clauss wish comes true when he accidentally bumps his head and starts believing hes SuperKlaus. With the help of Billie and Leo his elf-xecutive assistant, SuperKlaus will take on a toy-obsessed businessman to save Christmas.

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: An immature party girl moves in with her brothers family to get over a breakup and throws their lives out of whack.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-mans-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
programme.desc: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy, from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: Terror strikes in the heart of Mumbai, India, as members of Lashkar-e-Taiba storm the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel in a series of coordinated attacks throughout the city. Amid the gunfire and mayhem, a brave chef and kitchen worker decide to risk their own lives to try and protect the frightened guests. As the militants continue their assault on the hotel, a desperate couple must do whatever they can to protect their newborn baby.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.desc: Palau is a tiny country with a big story. In 2009, this island nation in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean created the worlds first shark sanctuary to protect more than 100 shark species from reckless overfishing and the brutal practice of commercial shark finning. Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the worlds largest marine sanctuary - a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.desc: Chimp Bens mysterious infection has spread to some of the others in his group, and its a race against time to diagnose and treat it effectively. Meanwhile, the orang-utans are watching their weight, but are not so keen to get onto the scales. Plus, the lemurs and stump-tailed macaques meet for the first time - could they become housemates?

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Bens foot infection has led to the amputation of one of his toes. Just as hes improving, Honey, one of the chimps in Hananyas house, is struck down by the mysterious bacterial infection - and it is serious.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: A biologist searches for a giant otter den at the southern edge of the Brazilian Pantanal.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World
programme.desc: The ruthless realm of some of the stealthiest and cleverest insects in the animal kingdom -- from praying mantises and aquatic insects to dragonflies.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: From melodic songs to strange hums, David Attenborough sets out to discover the sounds that gibbons, lyrebirds, bull elk, and more use to find a mate and warn off the competition.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.desc: Palau, a tiny island nation in the middle of the western Pacific ocean, is a land of giants. Large manta rays soar through its azure seas. Massive Second World War wrecks harbour dark secrets on the ocean floor. The archipelago is surrounded by a colossal underwater trench that reaches more than half a mile down into unseen depths. Its reef, one the largest living structures on the planet, is home to more than 1,500 species of fish.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: There is a scuffle between the female capuchins, Tia needs surgery, and orang-utan Amy is heavily pregnant - and very grumpy. Meanwhile, there is something new in the play area of the chimp nursery, and Alison has her last visit with Paulo, the baby woolly monkey she has successfully reared by hand.

programme.desc: Discover the ways in which natural selection and human pressure have shaped the raccoon dog, the golden jackal and the maned wolf.

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: In one of Africas greatest lakes, rock and water set the stage for evolutions most magnificent display. This episode tells the story of this remarkable example of evolution in action, as well as showing how the lake provides for a range of life, both above and below the surface.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough

programme.desc: One of the most majestic, unspoiled and rarely filmed areas in Africa is an exploration of how wildlife including cheetahs, hyenas and elephants survive the cycles of draught and rainfall.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Geoffroys marmoset males Cesar and Gizmo could soon have female partners, but first, a minor operation is required.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Venture along Earths coasts, where colliding worlds create a melting pot of biodiversity. Watch orcas hunt with precision, hold on as guillemot chicks take leaps of faith, crawl to safety with turtle hatchlings, and see crabs sculpt sandy galaxies.

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: On South Africas west coast, cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, it is challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: Large rodents called capybaras that live on the northern edge of the Brazilian Pantanal are spotlighted.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains
programme.desc: The elephants dig wells as the rain suddenly pours; a group of lions kill one of cheetah Kuletas cubs; wild dog Phoenix fights off a pack of hyena.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Pregnant woolly monkey Piquita looks fit to burst, capuchin Sean, over from Chile, is keen to prove that nobody can groom quite like he can, and life hangs in the balance for Blue the ruffed lemur.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Baby woolly monkey Paulo is tempted outside by some delicious bugs, while onions are used to encourage natural behaviour amongst the capuchins. The team also has a radical plan for the third meeting between youngster Ben and alpha male Hananya.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Stretching more than 700 kilometres through the wilds of Ontario, the Niagara Escarpment Biosphere Reserve begins with the mighty Niagara Falls and winds its way through deep valleys and caves.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: Numerous species, including giant anteaters, maned wolves and the greater rhea, flock to the grasslands of the Pantanal during the dry season.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World
programme.desc: The colourful world of Earths essential pollinators -- bees, moths and butterflies.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Using the latest audio technology, David Attenborough explores the crucial role of sound in nature, examining how it shapes and influences the everyday lives of animals, from communication to their behaviour and decisions.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.desc: Palau is a tiny country with a big story. In 2009, this island nation in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean created the worlds first shark sanctuary to protect more than 100 shark species from reckless overfishing and the brutal practice of commercial shark finning. Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the worlds largest marine sanctuary - a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges hes overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When a CEO is killed by a targeted explosion inside his penthouse, the team must work to figure out how someone accessed the highly secure building; Maggie pumps the brakes on her personal life.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges hes overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, and at the Goods house, Tom and Barbara are making decorations and crackers ready for Christmas Day, while at the Leadbetters, Margo has sent back her whole order because her Christmas tree is six and a quarter inches too short. However, when the company does not deliver her order the following day, she and Jerry are left with no decorations, food or drink. Can there be anything worse?

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Its been ten years since we last went to Billericay to spend Christmas with the Shipmans and the Wests.This year were off to Wales for the festivities, where Bryns cooking dinner for over thirteen people.

programme.desc: Lees plan to spend time alone with Lucy at Christmas is threatened by the presence of Tim, Daisy, Tim and Lucys parents, and even Barbara, doing the cooking. All seems to be going well until a murder mystery game brings family tensions to a head.

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: It is Christmas Day in the Royle household and Barbara is up to her eyes in it, as Jim is out of action following an unfortunate incident in the precinct while Dave and Denise are feeling the affects of the recession the most, and worry that Anthonys lavish gifts will eclipse their gift of a fridge magnet. Elsewhere, Joe reminisces about a tipsy evening of naked wrestling in front of the fire with Bobby Carter.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts travel to Cornwall to meet visitors bringing their family treasures to the National Maritime Museum. programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the National Maritime Museum in Falmouth as they discover more Cornish finds, including a collection of gruesome early medical instruments to promote bleeding. programme.desc: In Kursk, a `battlefield the size of Wales, the tide turns, and the Soviets push back, but as Germany retreats, they destroy all evidence of their genocidal activities.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts travel to Wightwick Manor near Wolverhampton as they delve into thousands of family treasures. Objects featured include remnants of German parachute silk used in World War Two to make silk knickers, and a rare piece of early English glass. Plus famous cricketer Ted Dexter brings a special piece with surprising family history.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce looks back on another vintage year for the `Antiques Roadshow. As experts choose their favourite finds, there are updates on what has happened to the objects since they first appeared. Some have gone on to be sold, whilst others have been loaned for exhibitions in the UK and even abroad, as a British flag captured by the Japanese during the fall of Singapore in World War Two is returned.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

Taani soon falls in love with her new dance partner, Raj, unaware that he is in fact her husband.
